title: Batman: Arkham Knight is finally ready for PC
text:
Batman: Arkham Knight is finally ready for PC 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Batman: Arkham Knight's release on PC was so bad that Warner Brothers pulled it from the store, but it promised to patch the game and re-rel...
